name: Mr Boon (48 hours game)
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022

Mr Boon the crab is hungry today, but he'll only eat cooked fish.
Help him find fish and cook them.

Fish are in the sea
And fire is in the upper world
( due to global warming)

Controls: You can use arrow keys, WASD, Joystick, or Touchscreen.
